text.section: Any person violating or refusing to comply with any of the provisions of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and shall be fined not less than $5 nor more than $25 or shall be imprisoned in the county jail for not more than 30 days, or shall be both fined and imprisoned. The State's Attorney and the sheriffs of the several counties shall prosecute all persons found violating the law by refusing to comply with its provisions.
In Calvert County the fine is $50 or 60 days.
This subtitle does not apply to the City of Baltimore, the City of Cambridge, or the City of Crisfield.
This section does not apply in Washington County.
This section does not apply in Garrett County.
This section does not apply to a violation of § 11-512, § 11-513, or § 11-514 of this subtitle.
